title: Ticket #6293: DAGMan "roadmap"
description:
Note: I've tried to organize the individual items within each section in a somewhat logical order; but there's not really an order between items in different sections.

Deal with late materialization/multi-proc nodes

  • #6292: Document that DAGMan doesn't work with late materialization
  • #6274: DAGMan doesn't work right with late materialization
  • #5370: Parallel jobs with retries cause DAGMan to hang
  • #1703: allow different semantics for multi-job clusters/ #349: Allow failure of some procs in multi-proc nodes
  • Specify dependencies between individual procs in two clusters (there's no ticket for this yet)

Make splices and sub-DAGs more alike

(#6263: Parent ticket: various splice improvements)

  • #3587: Add "socket" nodes for splices
  • #6288: Allow PRE/POST scripts on splices
  • #6262: Parse splices lazily
  • #6264: Allow retries on splices
  • #4824: Should DIR for splices work the same as for sub-DAGs?
  • #5653: Add per-splice DAG throttling
  • Allow final nodes within splices (no ticket for this yet)
  • #2693: Include subdag external nodes in parent DAG's node status file
  • #2980: RFC: Unify SPLICE and SUBDAG EXTERNAL in DAGman
  • #2649: Have subdag external functionality w/o an actual extra DAGMan
  • #6048: Have separate Dag objects for splices? (Whether this makes sense depends a lot on how many of the above things we want to implement.)

Communication with a running DAGMan

  • #2616: Create a command-line tool to communicate with DAGMan
  • #6074: Be able to modify maxjobs for a running DAGMan
  • #2831: Be able to "manually" retry nodes during a DAG run/ #4192: Allow "manual" node retries within a DAG
  • #3389: DAGMan should honor prio changes
  • #3756: provide command to peacefully pause a DAG
  • #1756: Be able to dynamically add nodes to a running DAG

"Bagman"

  • #1382: Be able to do condor_submit_dag on a set of submit files, w/o DAG file

Scaling

  • #5847: Have DAGMan maintain a connection to the schedd
  • #4852: Have -maxcores (or maxprocs?) limit in DAGMan
  • #5018: Have per-node-category maxidle throttle
  • #6204: DAGMan should throttle jobs in file transfer state?
  • #5330: Reduce memory footprint of DAGMan Job object
  • #4298: Move stuff out of DAGMan Job object
  • #439: DAGMan internal data structures need improvement
  • #444: Increasing DAGMan throughput with condor_submit
  • #927: Have adaptive DAGMAN_USER_LOG_ SCAN_INTERVAL
  • #4351: Improve scalability of DAGMan workflow log
